quote: Power has always corrupted, my dear. Even the promise of power. It is a hard thing to look at through the fence for hundreds of years without wondering what it would be like on the other side.
quote_letters: POWER HAS ALWAYS CORRUPTED MY DEAR EVEN THE PROMISE OF POWER IT IS A HARD THING TO LOOK AT THROUGH THE FENCE FOR HUNDREDS OF YEARS WITHOUT WONDERING WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE ON THE OTHER SIDE
